title: 高版本假矿？
author: youngklps
txt_content: md5的鬼畜操作把自带高性能假矿移除了，高版本有没有可用的假矿插件？

replies.author: 水煮清娃
replies.txt_content:
新版1.12.2 paper版 已经重新支持内置防透视，只要手动开启即可
打开paper.yml找到:    anti-xray:
      enabled: false复制代码把false改成true即可，如果配置太低可能会影响稳定性，但是这个内置的防透视比假矿插件好很多.


1.12.2最新服务端
下载地址

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
PaperSpigot 自带假矿，占用低

插件 http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-219882-1-1.html

replies.author: linmiao233
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 linmiao233 于 2018-8-23 17:42 编辑 

你好！一般核心都是有自带假矿的
找到服务器主目录的spigot.yml，打开注：No++显示为在95行
# This is the main configuration file for Spigot.
# As you can see, there's tons to configure. Some options may impact gameplay, so use
# with caution, and make sure you know what each option does before configuring.
# For a reference for any variable inside this file, check out the Spigot wiki at
# http://www.spigotmc.org/wiki/spigot-configuration/
# 
# If you need help with the configuration or have any questions related to Spigot,
# join us at the IRC or drop by our forums and leave a post.
# 
# IRC: #spigot @ irc.esper.net ( http://webchat.esper.net/?channel=spigot )
# Forums: http://www.spigotmc.org/forum/

config-version: 5
commands:
  tab-complete: 0
  replace-commands:
  - setblock
  - summon
  - testforblock
  - tellraw
  silent-commandblock-console: false
  spam-exclusions:
  - /skill
  log: true
messages:
  whitelist: You are not whitelisted on this server!
  unknown-command: Unknown command. Type "/help" for help.
  server-full: The server is full!
  outdated-client: Outdated client! Please use {0}
  outdated-server: Outdated server! I'm still on {0}
  restart: Server is restarting
settings:
  player-shuffle: 0
  filter-creative-items: true
  bungeecord: false
  sample-count: 12
  late-bind: false
  timeout-time: 60
  restart-on-crash: true
  restart-script: ./start.sh
  netty-threads: 4
  debug: false
  save-user-cache-on-stop-only: false
  attribute:
    maxHealth:
      max: 2048.0
    movementSpeed:
      max: 2048.0
    attackDamage:
      max: 2048.0
  user-cache-size: 1000
  global-api-cache: false
  int-cache-limit: 1024
  moved-too-quickly-threshold: 100.0
  moved-wrongly-threshold: 0.0625
stats:
  disable-saving: false
  forced-stats: {}
world-settings:
  default:
    verbose: true
    chunks-per-tick: 650
    clear-tick-list: false
    merge-radius:
      exp: 3.0
      item: 2.5
    view-distance: 10
    nerf-spawner-mobs: false
    mob-spawn-range: 4
    item-despawn-rate: 6000
    max-entity-collisions: 8
    enable-zombie-pigmen-portal-spawns: true
    zombie-aggressive-towards-villager: true
    arrow-despawn-rate: 1200
    entity-tracking-range:
      players: 48
      animals: 48
      monsters: 48
      misc: 32
      other: 64
    max-bulk-chunks: 5
    growth:
      cactus-modifier: 100
      cane-modifier: 100
      melon-modifier: 100
      mushroom-modifier: 100
      pumpkin-modifier: 100
      sapling-modifier: 100
      wheat-modifier: 100
    ticks-per:
      hopper-transfer: 8
      hopper-check: 8
    random-light-updates: false
    anti-xray:
      enabled: false      --------把false换成true
      engine-mode: 2
      hide-blocks:
      - 14
      - 15
      - 16
      - 21
      - 48
      - 49
      - 54
      - 56
      - 73
      - 74
      - 82
      - 129
      - 130
      replace-blocks:
      - 1
      - 5
    save-structure-info: true
    entity-activation-range:
      animals: 32
      monsters: 32
      misc: 16
    wither-spawn-sound-radius: 0
    hanging-tick-frequency: 100
    seed-village: 10387312
    seed-feature: 14357617
    dragon-death-sound-radius: 0
    hopper-alt-ticking: false
    hopper-amount: 1
    hunger:
      walk-exhaustion: 0.2
      sprint-exhaustion: 0.8
      combat-exhaustion: 0.3
      regen-exhaustion: 3.0
    max-tnt-per-tick: 100
效果的话你设置好后可以去服务器看看。不卡内存的。
本人就在用此方法
